#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int tc;
int n;
int A[102];
int B[102];
int vis[102][100001];
int dp[102][100001];

vector < pair<int,int> > v;

int f(int idx, int tym)
{
    if ( idx == n ) return 0;
    if ( vis[idx][tym] == tc ) return dp[idx][tym];
    vis[idx][tym] = tc;
    int ans = 1 + f(idx+1,tym);
    if ( tym + v[idx].second <= v[idx].first - 30 ) ans = min(ans, f(idx+1,tym + v[idx].second));
    dp[idx][tym] = ans;
    return ans;
}

//Code for FAST INPUT :)
template <typename T>
inline void fi(T *a)
{
    register char c=0;
    while (c<33) c=getchar_unlocked();
    *a=0;
    int tmp = 0;
    while (c>33)
    {
        if ( c == 45 ) tmp = 1;
        else *a=*a*10+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    if ( tmp == 1 ) *a = 0-(*a);
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    fi(&t);

    for ( tc = 1; tc <= t; tc++ ) {
        fi(&n);
        v.clear();
        for ( int i = 0; i < n; i++ ) fi(&A[i]), assert(A[i] <= 10000);
        for ( int i = 0; i < n; i++ ) fi(&B[i]), assert(B[i] <= 10000);
        for ( int i = 0; i < n; i++ ) {
            if ( B[i] == -1 ) continue;
            v.push_back(make_pair(B[i],A[i]));
        }
        sort(v.begin(),v.end());
        n = (int)v.size();
        printf("Case %d: %d\n", tc, f(0,0));
    }
    return 0;
}
